ygData.subject: Re: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure what the room is called, as I far as I was aware it was called the assassin room, but another named mob spawns there too, not sure what he was
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure what the room is called, as I far as I was aware it was called
the assassin room, but another named mob spawns there too, not sure what he
was called as I elected not to roll as I was getting the mask. But the
assassin is in the room at the top of a ladder, I found it quite easy to
get there, as long as you can grab an invis vs undead it takes 2 minutes to
get there from the zone (avoid the bats, they see thru invis-undead).

The people in my group thought I was a nutter going that far into lower guk
at level 30, but the group I was in was brilliant and I rarely dropped
below half health.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 30 songs - Veeshan







Moss <Olmoss@...> on 13/12/99 15:17:34

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mask of Deception




From: Moss <Olmoss@...>

John_Senior@... wrote:
(snips)
> and after 2 1/2 hours the assassin eventually spawned (constant ph's
> before hand), we killed him and my wizzie friend looted.

What room John ? Moonflower spent 7 hours shuttling back and forth
between groups holding something called the "Cav" room, the "Sage" room
and the "Executioner" room. Here is the bad part. The Assassin was
killed once the entire time. Someone shouted "Mask" and because I was
the only one there that could use it they told me to loot it. So I am
standing over the body going click, click, click when suddenly i get the
message "Someone is already looting that body" ...POOF !!! Nobody would
own up and all agreed "That was dirty. The Mask was Moon's". The
Assassin was never seen again and later some one opined "The assassin
spawns up the stairs". Hunh ? ...any ideas because just being in lower
Guk gives me sweaty palms :) I died just getting to the rooms when the
person who was leading me in had her invisibility to the dead go down
right in the middle of a pack of Greater Ice Bones. When Moon saw that
she calmly walked to the middle of the floor of a tower where she would
be easy to see and knelt down and bowed her head. It took only one round
and wasn't very painful, really :)
This was also my first experience sing my new Clarity song. I finally
met someone I had only read about here ! You know, the guy who tells you
what to do. He insisted I couldn't weave Clarity with anything else. I
explained, while I might not be able to weave 3 songs with it I
certainly could 2 and cited this board and John Kim, et al as my
authority. Heheh, all night long I am sill getting group tells "Is that
a Heal song I see !" ..got so bad I started slipping in Fulfils Chant
and Chains below his radar to help the group. They really love their
Clarity song don't they :)

Moonflower Bllue, 32nd Bard
Cazic-Thule

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
